def Script_Execute ( oContext ): #Dont rename this function sel = Application.Selection(0) ImmedMode = 0 if Application.Preferences.GetPreferenceValue( "xsiprivate_unclassified.OperationMode" ) == True: ImmedMode = 1 result= Application.ApplyGenOp("ExtractEdgeLoopOp", "", sel, "", ImmedMode, "", "") Application.InspectObj(result)

def Script_Execute ( oContext ): #Dont rename this function ImmedMode = Application.Preferences.GetPreferenceValue( "xsiprivate_unclassified.OperationMode" ) #Is ImmediateMode enabled? curveList = list() for knot in Application.Selection: if knot.Type == "knotSubComponent": curveList.append(knot.SubComponent.Parent3DObject) #Add curve to list of curves Application.SetCurveKnotMultiplicity(knot, 0, ImmedMode)

def Script_Execute ( oContext ): #Dont rename this function #ImmedMode = Application.Preferences.GetPreferenceValue( "xsiprivate_unclassified.OperationMode" ) #Is ImmediateMode enabled? #Application.LogMessage("ImmedMode at start is: " + str(ImmedMode)) knots = list() Sel = Application.Selection for obj in Sel: if obj.Type == "knotSubComponent": knots.append(obj)
#Application.Preferences.SetPreferenceValue( "xsiprivate_unclassified.OperationMode", False ) #NewImmedMode = Application.Preferences.GetPreferenceValue( "xsiprivate_unclassified.OperationMode" ) #Is ImmediateMode enabled? #Application.LogMessage ("ImmedMode before applying Op is: " + str(NewImmedMode))
Op = Application.ApplyTopoOp("SetNurbsCrvKnotMultiplicity", knots, 3, "siImmediatetOperation", "") #Result = Application.SetCurveKnotMultiplicity(knots,3,"siPersistentOperation") Application.LogMessage("Created operator: " + str(Op))
Application.InspectObj(Op,"","",4,False)
#Application.AutoInspect(Op)
""" if Result != None:
if ImmedMode == True: #Was the ImmediateMode enabled when operation was started? ReturnVal = Application.InspectObj(Result[0],"","",4,True) if ReturnVal == True: #User has canceled? Application.DeleteObj(Result) else: Application.FreezeModeling(Result) else: #We are not in ImmediateMode, this is simpler... keyState = Application.GetKeyboardState() #Get currently pressed modifier keys (if any) bCtrlDown = keyState[1] == 2 #Is Ctrl pressed? bAutoInspect = Application.GetUserPref( "AutoInspectEnabled" ) if bAutoInspect and bCtrlDown==False or bAutoInspect==False and bCtrlDown: Application.InspectObj(Result,"","",1,False)
#except: #pass
#Application.Preferences.SetPreferenceValue( "xsiprivate_unclassified.OperationMode",ImmedMode ) """
def Script_Execute ( oContext ): #Dont rename this function Application.Commands( "Direct Manip Tool" ).Execute()

#The following code adds a menu item per light in the scene to the bottom of the menu # which selects the respective light (or inspects it when ctrl key is pressed at the same time)
def QMenu_Menu_Execute( oContext ): #Don't rename this function! self = oContext.CurrentObject self.removeAllTempMenuItems() #Clear the temp menu items so they don't pile up in the mneu after subsequent calls Lights = Application.ActiveSceneRoot.FindChildren("", "light", "", True) for oLight in Lights: oLightItem = Application.QMenuCreateObject("MenuItem") oLightItem.name = oLight.FullName
Code = ('def Script_Execute (oContext):
') Code += "	bCtrlDown = (Application.GetKeyboardState()[1]) == 2
" Code += "	bAutoInspect = Application.GetValue('preferences.Interaction.autoinspect')
" Code += "	if bAutoInspect and bCtrlDown or bAutoInspect==False and bCtrlDown==False: Application.InspectObj("" + oLight.FullName + "");
" Code += ("	else: Application.SelectObj('" + oLight.FullName + "','','');") oLightItem.code = Code self.appendTempMenuItem (oLightItem)
def QMenu_Menu_Execute( oContext ): #Don't rename this function! #Add your script code here pass
def QMenu_Menu_Execute ( oContext ): #Don't rename this function! #Add your script code here pass
def QMenu_Menu_Execute ( oContext ): #Don't rename this function! #Add your script code here pass
def QMenu_Menu_Execute( oContext ): #Don't rename this function! #Add your script code here pass

#The following code adds a menu item per existing camera to the bottom of the menu # which selects the respective camera (or inspects it when ctrl key is pressed at the same time)
def QMenu_Menu_Execute (oContext): #Don't rename this function! self = oContext.CurrentObject self.removeAllTempMenuItems() #Clear the temp menu items so they don't pile up in the menu after subsequent calls Cams = Application.ActiveSceneRoot.FindChildren("", "camera", "", True)
for oCam in Cams: oCamItem = Application.QMenuCreateObject("MenuItem") oCamItem.name = oCam.FullName
Code = ('def Script_Execute (oContext):
') Code += ('	Application.SelectObj("'+ oCam.FullName + '", "", "")
') Code += ('	bCtrlDown = (Application.GetKeyboardState()[1]) == 2
') Code += ('	bAutoInspect = Application.GetValue("preferences.Interaction.autoinspect")
') Code += ('	if bAutoInspect and bCtrlDown or bAutoInspect==False and bCtrlDown==False: Application.InspectObj("' + oCam.FullName + '.Camera",)') oCamItem.code = Code self.appendTempMenuItem (oCamItem)
def QMenu_Menu_Execute ( oContext ): #Don't rename this function! #Add your script code here pass

def QMenu_Menu_Execute( oContext ): #Don't rename this function! self = oContext.CurrentObject self.removeAllTempMenuItems() #Clear the temp menu items so they don't pile up in the menu after subsequent calls Cams = Application.ActiveSceneRoot.FindChildren("", "Light", "", True)
for oCam in Cams: if Application.GetValue(oCam.FullName + ".light.Type") == 2: print (oCam.FullName + " is a spotlight") oCamItem = Application.QMenuCreateObject("MenuItem") oCamItem.name = oCam.FullName
Code = ('def Script_Execute (oContext):
	oVM = Application.Desktop.ActiveLayout.Views.Find( "View Manager" )
') Code+= ('	oView = oVM.GetAttributeValue("focusedviewport")
') Code += ('	oVM.SetAttributeValue("activecamera:" + oView + "","' + oCam.FullName + '")
')
oCamItem.code = Code self.appendTempMenuItem (oCamItem)

def QMenu_Menu_Execute( oContext ): #Don't rename this function! self = oContext.CurrentObject self.removeAllTempMenuItems() #Clear the temp menu items so they don't pile up in the menu after subsequent calls Cams = Application.ActiveSceneRoot.FindChildren("", "Camera", "", True)
for oCam in Cams: oCamItem = Application.QMenuCreateObject("MenuItem") oCamItem.name = oCam.FullName
Code = ('def Script_Execute ( oContext ):
	') Code += ('oVM = Application.Desktop.ActiveLayout.Views.Find( "View Manager" )
	') Code += ('oView = oVM.GetAttributeValue("focusedviewport")
	') Code += ('oVM.SetAttributeValue("activecamera:" + oView + "","' + oCam.FullName + '")
')
oCamItem.code = Code self.appendTempMenuItem (oCamItem)

QMenu_MenuDisplayContexts.QMenu_MenuDisplayContext: def QMenuContext_Execute( oContext ): #This function must not be renamed! Type = oContext.Types[0] ComponentParentTypes = oContext.ComponentParentTypes if Type == "polymsh": #Is the first selected object a Polymesh? return True if ((Type == "edgeSubComponent") or (Type == "pntSubComponent") or (Type == "polySubComponent")): if ComponentParentTypes[0] == "polymsh": #Is the parent of the selected component(s) a polymesh? return True return False #This function must return a boolean!
def QMenuContext_Execute( oContext ): #Don't rename this function return True

Function QMenuContext_Execute(oContext) 'This function must not be renamed! LogMessage(oContext.CurrentObject.name) classNames = oContext.ClassNames 'classNames = oContext.getSelectionClassNames() LogMessage classNames(0) 'Application.LogMessage(ComponentClassNames) 'Application.LogMessage(ComponentParents) 'Application.LogMessage(ComponentParentTypes) 'Application.LogMessage(ComponentParentClassNames) QMenuContext_Execute = True 'This function must return a boolean end Function
def QMenuContext_Execute( oContext ): #This function must not be renamed! if oContext.Types[0] == "TransfoGroup": return True #This function must return a boolean return False
def QMenuContext_Execute( oContext ): #This function must not be renamed! Types = oContext.Types if Types[0] == "surfmeh": return True return False #This function must return a boolean
